welcome.title: Challenge Your Mind
welcome.description: A quick and accurate way to assess your logical thinking and reasoning skills.

language.title: Choose language
language.description: Select your language for a better experience!

pricingCard.freeTestsDescription: Any test is available for free!
pricingCard.freeReportsDescription: Free full reports for any test
pricingCard.uniqueCrownDescription: Unique badge added to your profile

offersSlider.title: Unlock Full Access
offersSlider.description: Go Premium to get unlimited tests, detailed reports, and smarter insights — no limits, just results.
offersSlider.inviteDescription: Turn your invites into free brain-boosting challenges — every 3 friends who buy a test unlock one for you.

profile.title: Fill the Profile
profile.empty: There are no completed tests yet

invitations.title: Invitations
invitations.description: Invite 3 friends to buy a test and unlock a free brain challenge!

completedTests.title: Completed Tests
completedTests.NoTests: There are no completed tests yet

invitations.title: Get a Free Test
invitations.description: Turn your invites into free brain-boosting challenges — every 3 friends who buy a test unlock one for you.

fillProfile.title: Fill your profile

profession.title: Choose Profession
profession.description: Choose your profession to compare yourself with other workers

country.title: Choose Country
country.description: Choose your country to compare yourself with other people in it

results.title: Results
results.worldComparison: You are smarter than <percent>{{percent}}</percent>% of people in the world.
results.celebrityComparisonText: Your IQ just left <celebrity>{{celebrity}}</celebrity> in the dust. He’s only got <celebrityIQ>{{celebrityIQ}}</celebrityIQ>!
results.countryText: You scored higher than <percent>{{percent}}%</percent> of people in <country>{{country}}</country>.
results.ageText: You are smarter than <percent>{{percent}}%</percent> of people in your age group.
